summary: Frontend testing completed for MegaRadio features: Profile Followers/Follows clickability, Languages page, and Favorites page redesign. All 8 requested features tested successfully with minor issues noted.

ui_bugs.issue: Typo in empty message: 'You don' have any' should be 'You don't have any'

issues: Sort/Search icons in header may not be visible in React Native Web empty state - could be rendering issue

action_items: Fix typo in favorites.tsx line 250: Change "You don' have any" to "You don't have any"
critical_code_review_comments: Profile page Followers/Follows stats are correctly wrapped in TouchableOpacity with proper navigation
Languages page correctly uses AsyncStorage for persistence via LANGUAGE_KEY
Favorites page implements all 5 sort options (Newest, Oldest, A-Z, Z-A, Custom)
Favorites store correctly implements getSortedFavorites() with all sorting algorithms
Grid/List view mode toggle is properly implemented in sort modal
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features working correctly. Languages page stores selection in AsyncStorage. Favorites page uses local favoritesStore for data. Sort modal cannot be tested in empty state via web preview.

test_1_profile_followers_click.details: Clicking 'Followers' text on Profile page navigates to /followers URL, shows list of followers with Remove buttons

test_2_profile_follows_click.details: Clicking 'Follows' text on Profile page navigates to /follows URL, shows list of follows with Unfollow buttons

test_3_profile_language_navigation.details: Clicking 'Language' menu item on Profile page navigates to /languages page

test_4_languages_page_display.details: Languages page shows list of 30 languages with English name and native name (e.g., German/Deutsch, French/Français)

test_5_languages_search.details: Search functionality filters languages correctly - searching 'Spanish' shows only Spanish (Español)

test_6_languages_selection.details: Clicking a language selects it (pink filled radio button) and saves to AsyncStorage

test_7_favorites_empty_state.details: Empty state shows heart-outline icon, "You don' have any favorites yet" message, and "Discover stations near to you!" link

test_8_favorites_sort_modal_code_review.details: Sort modal code contains all 5 options (Newest first, Oldest first, A-Z, Z-A, Custom order) and Grid/List toggle. Cannot test visually in empty state.

screenshots_captured: .screenshots/profile_page.png - Profile page with 86 Followers/86 Follows stats
.screenshots/languages_search_spanish.png - Search filtering to show only Spanish

mocked_apis.favorites_data: Stored in AsyncStorage via favoritesStore, not from backend API
